summary: Email chain between attorney Sigrid McCawley and an unidentified recipient discussing efforts to find a trauma therapist and apply for victim compensation for a client who is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The client suffered significant trauma and loss of livelihood due to Epstein's conduct.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP who is advocating for her client, an Epstein victim, to receive trauma therapy and victim compensation.

connections.description: McCawley's client is a victim of Epstein, and McCawley is seeking assistance for her client as a result of Epstein's conduct.

events.title: Epstein's attack on victim
events.description: The victim was attacked by Jeffrey Epstein, and after reporting to authorities, faced relentless pressure which ruined her livelihood and caused significant trauma.

events.title: Inquiry for victim assistance
events.description: Sigrid McCawley emails seeking help to find a trauma therapist and apply for victim compensation for her client.

events.title: Follow-up on therapist search
events.description: Response indicating research was done and contact made with County Victim Assistance to find trauma-focused therapists for the victim.

keyFacts: An Epstein victim, represented by attorney Sigrid McCawley, is seeking a trauma therapist and victim compensation due to significant trauma and loss of livelihood caused by Epstein.
The victim faced relentless pressure after reporting Epstein's attack to authorities, which ruined her livelihood.
Efforts are being made to apply for the New York State Crime Victims Compensation program, with an FBI support letter mentioned for submission.
County Victim Assistance was contacted and provides referrals to trauma-focused therapists who have assisted similar individuals.
